data.name: Droid Escape
data.detailed_description:
A SPACE ADVENTURE

Anny K. and her robot Droid 07 were kidnapped and locked in different rooms inside a ship controlled by DreX Androids. What they don't know is that anyone has a device to control the Droid 07 remotely and can recognize it to escape back to their planet. In this adventure, help Droid 07 to overcome challenges, discover mysteries and free your friend from the miniaigas.

A PUZZLE GAME FULL OF CHALLENGES

• The game has a progression system for the character
main Droid 07 that unlocks new abilities as the
player advances through levels;
• More than 40 levels in 4 different worlds;
• Coin system that, when collected, unlock phases
bonus;
• 2 playable characters;
• Great sound effects, exciting story and music tracks
exciting to keep the player fully immersed in the Game;
• Beautiful retro graphics in pixel art style, rescuing a nostalgia for
old games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
